title: IEdgeFlangeFeatureData.LockAngle
description: Gets or sets whether to lock the flange angle for the Up To Edge and Merge option of this edge flange.
returns: True to lock the flange angle (default), false to not
remarks:
This property is valid only when:
merging two bodies in a multibody part,
- and -
IEdgeFlangeFeatureData::OffsetType
is set to
swFlangeOffsetTypes_e
.swFlangeOffsetUptoEdgeAndMerge.
